title: Level 14 but I can't post.
body: Whenever I try to post on any board outside of H&S it tells me I can't until I am level 7.

replies.body: It looks like your boards profile has updated to show as level 14!  Are you still having issues posting, and where?  Some areas have different level requirements, such as level 15 for General Discussion.
Just wait for a bit, It will add you soon{{champion:32}} . What did you want to post by the way?
